person.persName: Samuel Pittman, Sr. (Green County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth Quarles Pittman in Pulaski County, Kentucky, on January 16, 1850. Father of Nancy Pittman, William S. Pittman, Mary Pittman, Polly Pittman, Julian Pittman, and Samuel Pittman, Jr. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860.
